title: Report of Pr. BRANCH
content: Our in-depth analyses report a strong degradation of the forest ecosystem. Almost all animal species are affected, some of them showing a rare hostility. This disappearance of the forests reduces the absorption of CO2 by the trees. More details are provided in the report of Pr. BUSH.

title: Report of Pr. BUSH
content: Following the work of Prof. BRANCH, we sent a second team to the field. On the spot, the air and the soil were very acidic. An unknown species resembling the description made by Prof. BRANCHE attacked us. We report the death of three members out of the five people who made up the research team.

title: Report of Pr. BUSH
content: As I stand here among the dying trees of the forest, I cannot help but feel a deep sense of sadness and despair. The once thriving ecosystem is a shadow of its former self. I hope that through my research, I can work to find a solution before it is too late.
